column1: #Text=[0261] 8-Hydroxyquinoline (4.64 g, 31.96 mMoles) was dissolved in acetonitrile (50 mL).
#Text=To this solution was added 2.5M n-BuLi (15.5 mL, 36.36 mMoles) drop by drop at room temperature under a nitrogen atmosphere.
#Text=After the addition of the n-BuLi, the mixture was stirred for 1 hour.
#Text=The yellow solid was filtered off, washed with a little cold water, acetonitrile and finally air dried.
